    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public abstract Connection getConnection()
        Returns:
        New connection to the database

      • connect

        public void connect(Callback callback)
        (Re-)Connects to the the database and initializes it.
        Creates the table (if doesn't exist) and tests the connection
        Parameters:
        callback - Callback that - if succeeded - returns the amount of shops that were found (as int)

      • removeShop

        public void removeShop(Shop shop,
                       Callback callback)
        Remove a shop from the database
        Parameters:
        shop - Shop to remove
        callback - Callback that - if succeeded - returns null

      • isShop

        public void isShop(int id,
                   Callback callback)
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the shop
        callback - Callback that - if succeeded - returns whether a shop with the given ID exists (as boolean)

      • getShops

        public void getShops(boolean showConsoleMessages,
                     Callback callback)
        Get all shops from the database
        Parameters:
        callback - Callback that - if succeeded - returns an array of all shops (as Shop[])
        showConsoleMessages - Whether console messages (errors or warnings) should be shown

      • addShop

        public void addShop(Shop shop,
                    Callback callback)
        Adds a shop to the database
        Parameters:
        shop - Shop to add
        callback - Callback that - if succeeded - returns the ID the shop was given (as int)

      • logEconomy

        public void logEconomy(org.bukkit.entity.Player executor,
                       org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack product,
                       org.bukkit.OfflinePlayer vendor,
                       Shop.ShopType shopType,
                       org.bukkit.Location location,
                       double price,
                       ShopBuySellEvent.Type type,
                       Callback callback)
        Log an economy transaction to the database
        Parameters:
        executor - Player who bought/sold something
        product - ItemStack that was bought/sold
        vendor - Vendor of the shop
        location - Location of the shop
        price - Price (buyprice or sellprice, depends on type)
        type - Whether the player bought or sold something
        callback - Callback that - if succeeded - returns null

      • getRevenue

        public void getRevenue(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                       long logoutTime,
                       Callback callback)
        Get the revenue a player got while he was offline
        Parameters:
        player - Player whose revenue to get
        logoutTime - Time in milliseconds when he logged out the last time
        callback - Callback that - if succeeded - returns the revenue the player made while offline (as double)

      • logLogout

        public void logLogout(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                      long timestamp,
                      Callback callback)
        Log a logout to the database
        Parameters:
        player - Player who logged out
        timestamp - Time in milliseconds when the player logged out
        callback - Callback that - if succeeded - returns null

      • getLastLogout

        public void getLastLogout(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                          Callback callback)
        Get the last logout of a player
        Parameters:
        player - Player who logged out
        callback - Callback that - if succeeded - returns the time in milliseconds the player logged out (as long)
